Hero.headline: Powerful for developers. <breakline>Fast for everyone.</breakline>
Hero.description: Bring blockchain to the people. Solana supports experiences for power users, new consumers, and everyone in between.
Hero.logosIntroduction: Powering tools and integrations from companies all around the world

TokenExtensions.headline: Coindesk: Token Extensions Update to SPL Token Program Live After Year in Development
TokenExtensions.description: Token extensions let developers hard code restrictions in their digital assets, enhancing compliance controls for businesses building on Solana.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Don’t keep your users waiting.Solana has block times of 400 milliseconds — and as hardware gets faster, so will the network.

scalable.title: Scalable
scalable.description: Get big, quick. Solana is made to handle thousands of transactions per second, and fees for both developers and users remain less than $0.0025.

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.description: The Solana network is validated by thousands of nodes that operate independently of each other, ensuring your data remains secure and censorship resistant.

energyEfficient.title: Energy Efficient
energyEfficient.description: Solana’s proof of stake network and other innovations minimize its impact on the environment. Each Solana transaction uses about the same energy as a few Google searches.

cases.helium: Helium brings real-world 5G networks on Solana
cases.gainForest: GainForest brings transparency to climate preservation efforts
cases.hivemapper: Hivemapper decentralizes mapping with better real-time data and community incentives
cases.asics: ASICS builds loyalty program with Solana Pay

BuildForGrowth.headline: Build for growth.
BuildForGrowth.description: Solana Pay is now available to millions of businesses as an approved app integration on Shopify. Solana Pay is built for immediate USDC transactions, fees that are fractions of a penny, and a net-zero environmental impact.
BuildForGrowth.learnMoreBtn: Learn more about Payments on Solana

JoinAThrivingCommunity.headline: Join a thriving community
JoinAThrivingCommunity.callToActDescription: It's time to join the thousands of creators, artists, and developers using Solana.

Metadata.title: Solana | Powerful for Developers. Fast for Everyone.
Metadata.description: Build on the world's fastest blockchain. Solana delivers the speed and scalability needed for mass adoption, with fees below $0.0025.
Metadata.keywords: Solana, blockchain, crypto, web3, developers, scalability, speed, solana pay, DeFi, NFTs
Metadata.openGraphImageAlt: Solana logo with the tagline 'Powerful for developers. Fast for everyone.' and network performance data.
